remarks: Add antecedent to ~ ax-frege2 .  More general statement than ~ frege3 . Like ~ ax-frege2 , it is essentially a closed form of ~ mpd , however it has an extra antecedent. It would be more natural to prove from ~ a1i and ~ ax-frege2 in Metamath. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: rp-frege3g $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ps -> ( ch -> th ) ) -> ( ( ps -> ch ) -> ( ps -> th ) ) ) ) $.
